co.paralleluniverse.fibers.instrument

Class MethodDatabase

  • java.lang.Object
    • co.paralleluniverse.fibers.instrument.MethodDatabase
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Log

    public class MethodDatabase
extends Object
implements Log

    Collects information about classes and their suspendable methods.

    Provides access to configuration parameters and to logging

      • checkClass

        protected CheckInstrumentationVisitor checkClass(String className)

        Overwrite this function if library is used in a transformation chain.

        This method must create a new CheckInstrumentationVisitor and visit the specified class with it.

        Parameters:
        className - the class the needs to be analysed
        Returns:
        a new CheckInstrumentationVisitor that has visited the specified class or null if the class was not found
